sentences.en: Any spillage of chemical should be reported to your supervisor immediately.
sentences.cn: 任何时侯溢出化学品必须立即报告给你的主管.

sentences.en: Cleans all spillage during mealtime and at closing.
sentences.cn: 用餐期间及结束用餐时清理所有的脏物.

sentences.en: Closed mechanical grabs for be maintained to avoid spillage and shall tightly while being lifted.
sentences.cn: 应使用密封式机械抓斗,以免物料溅溢,并于提起时保持抓斗密封.

sentences.en: Device can spill water; install where spillage is not objectionable.
sentences.cn: 装置可能会喷溅水, 要安装在喷溅不会产生危害的地方.

sentences.en: If spillage occurs, the affected skin should be thoroughly washed.
sentences.cn: 如果溅出药液, 应彻底冲洗受侵染的皮肤.

sentences.en: If you have any spillage problem or the demand, please as necessary relates with us.
sentences.cn: 如果您有任何泄漏方面的问题或需求, 请随时与我们联系.

sentences.en: Immediate cleaning up of any spillage.
sentences.cn: 即刻清洁任何点火用具.

sentences.en: Put the bottle in a plastic bag in case of spillage.
sentences.cn: 把瓶子装在塑料袋里，以免洒得到处都是。

sentences.en: The spillage area should be washed with water, by means of another sponge.
sentences.cn: 溢出的地方, 须用水冲洗并用另外的海绵擦拭.

sentences.en: The valve should not be installed in an area where freezing or spillage will cause damage.
sentences.cn: 这种阀门不应该安装在冰冻或泄漏可能造成破坏的地方.

sentences.en: There is a 2 inches deep well in the solvent storage cabinets to contain spillage of solvents.
sentences.cn: 溶剂柜中有2英寸深的凹槽容纳漏出溶剂.

sentences.en: This feature protects against any spillage during start - up operation.
sentences.cn: 在开始运作期间这个功能避免任何泄漏或溢出.

sentences.en: This feature protects against any spillage during start - up or operation.
sentences.cn: 这个功能有助于在开启或运行期间防止任何泄漏或溢出.

sentences.en: To wear protective clothing and appropriate equipment to handle any chemical spillage situation.
sentences.cn: 并应该使用保护衣物及合适的设备来清理化学废物.

words.tran_cn: 溢出，溅出；溢出量；摔下；小塞子
